item.schism.blood_bucket.description: A gruesome mixture of flesh and blood.
item.schism.veshoney_bucket.description: A thick sticky substance created by giant wasp-like insects.
item.schism.warded_acid_bucket.descripti: A fluid that dissolves defenses, enchanted with a protective ward.
item.schism.warded_lava_bucket.descripti: Molten rock and metal, enchanted with a protective ward.
item.schism.warded_ooze_bucket.descripti: A deadly freezing gel, enchanted with a protective ward.
item.schism.warded_poison_bucket.descrip: A poisonous fluid, enchanted with a protective ward.
